Help & FAQ

Help & FAQ

General

What is Secret RSVP?

FSecret RSVP is a unique event experience designed to help you meet new people in a fun and relaxed setting. Our events combine social psychology, mystery, and technology to create memorable connections, whether romantic, friendly, or professional.

What should I bring to the event?

Please bring a valid ID and a copy of your digital ticket and a well charged phone. We also recommend bringing a smile and an open mind!

Profile & Account

Will my last name be displayed?

No, your last name will not be displayed on your public profile. We value your privacy and only display your first name.

What should I include in my bio?

Your bio should be a short description of yourself, including your important interests and what you're looking for. Keep it friendly and positive!

How do I delete my account?

If you wish to delete your account, provide your account email, full name, and event city and submit your request here. Our support team will process your request within 48 business hours.

Event Day

How do I check in to the event?

Upon arrival, show your QR code ticket to the host for check-in. The check-in process will be quick and seamless.

Can I update my profile during the event?

Yes, you can update your profile during the event, but we recommend completing your profile beforehand to ensure the best matching experience.

Messaging & Notifications

How do I send messages to other attendees?

After the event, you can use the messaging feature in the app to connect with other attendees. Messaging is usually available for 3 days post-event.

How do I manage my notifications?

To manage your notifications, go to the 'Settings' section. Here you can choose your preferred notification methods (email, SMS, push notifications) and set the frequency of alerts.

Troubleshooting

I didn't receive an email. What should I do?

First, check your spam or junk folder. If you still can't find the email, contact our support team for assistance.

How do I contact support?

You can contact our support team by using our Contact Form. We're here to help!
